properties.name: __localizationCache
properties.description:
Internal singleton cache. This is the private implementation of the
behaviour; don't interact with it directly.

properties.name: language
properties.description:
A valid IETF language tag as a string that `app-localize-behavior` will
use to localize this component.

See https://github.com/PolymerElements/app-localize-behavior for API
documentation and more information.

properties.name: formats
useKeyIfMissing
properties.description:
Use the key for localization if value for  language is missing. Should
always be true for our components.

properties.name: localize
properties.description:
Translates a string to the current `language`. Any parameters to the
string should be passed in order, as follows:
`localize(stringKey, param1Name, param1Value, param2Name, param2Value)`

properties.name: bubbleEvent
properties.description: If true, will bubble up the event to the parents

methods.name: __computeLocalize
methods.description: Returns a computed `localize` method, based on the current `language`.

attributes.name: language
attributes.description:
A valid IETF language tag as a string that `app-localize-behavior` will
use to localize this component.

See https://github.com/PolymerElements/app-localize-behavior for API
documentation and more information.

attributes.name: formats
use-key-if-missing
attributes.description:
Use the key for localization if value for  language is missing. Should
always be true for our components.

attributes.name: localize
attributes.description:
Translates a string to the current `language`. Any parameters to the
string should be passed in order, as follows:
`localize(stringKey, param1Name, param1Value, param2Name, param2Value)`

attributes.name: bubble-event
attributes.description: If true, will bubble up the event to the parents

elements.description:
### Usage

    <px-accordion header-value="Header Caption" show-action></px-accordion>

### Optional: Parent Container with Expand/Collapse All

Note: px-accordion-group also implements app-localize-behavior so that the strings can be customized/localized.

    <px-accordion-group>
      <px-accordion header-value="Header Caption" show-action></px-accordion>
      <px-accordion header-value="Header Caption" show-action></px-accordion>
      <px-accordion header-value="Header Caption" show-action></px-accordion>
    </px-accordion-group>

### Styling
The following custom properties are available for styling:

Custom property | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--px-headings-heading-subsection-color | Text color for the accordion header
--px-headings-heading-subsection-background | Background color for the accordion header

properties.name: headerValue
properties.description: The text to place in the header of the accordion

properties.name: icons
properties.description:
Icons to be used by the accordion component.
You should specify a valid iron icon for 'more' and 'less', at least,
plus an additional icons for 'action' if `showAction` is true.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Flag indicating whether the accordion should be disabled.

properties.name: showAction
properties.description: Flag indicating whether the 'action' icon should be shown on the right hand side.

properties.name: status
properties.description: String that will appear in the right hand side of the accordion.

properties.name: opened
properties.description:
If `true` the accordion is opened. If `false` it is closed. Use to
observe the user opening/closing the accordion, or set to programatically
change the accordion state.

properties.name: _expandCollapseIcon
properties.description: The icon to use in the accordion, either 'more' or 'less' depending on current state.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Shows or hides the accordion content.

methods.name: _toggleHandler
methods.description:
Internal toggle handler called when the user interacts with the
toggle icon. Toggles the accordion and sends an event that includes
the source DOM event that triggered the toggle.

params.name: e
params.description: Source tap/click event that triggered this handler

attributes.name: header-value
attributes.description: The text to place in the header of the accordion

attributes.name: icons
attributes.description:
Icons to be used by the accordion component.
You should specify a valid iron icon for 'more' and 'less', at least,
plus an additional icons for 'action' if `showAction` is true.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Flag indicating whether the accordion should be disabled.

attributes.name: show-action
attributes.description: Flag indicating whether the 'action' icon should be shown on the right hand side.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: String that will appear in the right hand side of the accordion.

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description:
If `true` the accordion is opened. If `false` it is closed. Use to
observe the user opening/closing the accordion, or set to programatically
change the accordion state.
